username.description: This can be a Cluster-scoped or SVM-scoped account, depending on whether a Cluster-level or SVM-level API is required. For more information, please read the documentation U(https://goo.gl/BRu78Z).

root_volume_aggregate.description: The aggregate on which the root volume will be created. Required when C(state=present).

name.description: The name of the SVM to manage.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the ONTAP instance.

root_volume_security_style.description: Security Style of the root volume. When specified as part of the vserver-create, this field represents the security style for the Vserver root volume. When specified as part of vserver-get-iter call, this will return the list of matching Vservers. Possible values are 'unix', 'ntfs', 'mixed'. The 'unified' security style, which applies only to Infinite Volumes, cannot be applied to a Vserver's root volume. Valid options are "unix" for NFS, "ntfs" for CIFS, "mixed" for Mixed, "unified" for Unified. Required when C(state=present)

state.description: Whether the specified SVM should exist or not.

root_volume.description: Root volume of the SVM. Required when C(state=present).
